Package it.polimi.ingsw.Observer

Interface ModelObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualView
public interface ModelObserver
Interface that offers the methods used by the model observers to send updates of his state in order to update the view accordingly.

  • Method Details

    • onGameCreation

      void onGameCreation(int numPlayers, ArrayList<String> nicknames, GameMode gameMode, int whereMNId, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> entrances, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> emptyClouds, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> isleStudents, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> studentsOnCharacter, ArrayList<Integer> numTowers, int money, int generalReserve, ArrayList<TowerColors> towerColors, ArrayList<String> characterNames, ArrayList<Integer> characterCost, ArrayList<Integer> denyCards, ArrayList<String> characterCardsDescription, ArrayList<Squads> squads)
      Updates the ModelStorage by adding all the components of the game that are modified or created at the start of the game.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - Number of players of the game.
      nicknames - Nicknames of each player.
      gameMode - Game mode of the game.
      whereMNId - ID of the isle where there's mother nature.
      entrances - Students on each entrance.
      emptyClouds - clouds Students on each cloud (they will be empty at the start of the game).
      isleStudents - Students on each isle.
      studentsOnCharacter - Students on each character card.
      numTowers - Number of towers of each player.
      money - Number of money of each player.
      generalReserve - Number of money in the general money reserve.
      towerColors - Color of the towers on each tower storage.
      characterNames - Name of each character card.
      characterCost - Cost of each character card.
      denyCards - Deny cards on each character card.
      characterCardsDescription - Brief description of each character card.
      squads - Team of each player.

    • onEndGame

      void onEndGame(String winner, int winnerID)
      Updates the view with a message of end game
      Parameters:
      winner - is the name of the winner
      winnerID - is -1 if the game ended in a draw

    • onGamePhases

      void onGamePhases(int activePlayer, String activePlayerNickname, GamePhases gamePhases, ActionPhases actionPhases)
      Updates the ModelStorage when there's a change of the turn or when the game is ending.
      Parameters:
      activePlayer - The player that this turn is the active one.
      activePlayerNickname - is the nickname of the active player
      gamePhases - The actual game phase of the turn.
      actionPhases - The actual sub-phase of the action phase of the turn.

    • onAssistantCard

      void onAssistantCard(int playerID, int turnOrderPlayed, int movementMNPlayed, ArrayList<Integer> turnOrdersAvailable, ArrayList<Integer> movementsMNAvailable)
      Updates the ModelStorage when an assistant card is played.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that played the assistant card.
      turnOrderPlayed - Turn order of the assistant card played that now is in the discard pile.
      movementMNPlayed - Mother nature possible movement of the assistant card played that now is in the discard pile.
      turnOrdersAvailable - List of all the turn orders of the assistant cards that the player hasn't played yet.
      movementsMNAvailable - List of all the possible mother nature movement of the assistant cards that the player hasn't played yet.

    • onStudentMoving_toDining

      void onStudentMoving_toDining(int playerID, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> entrance, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> dining)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a student is moved on the dining room.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that moved the student from his entrance to his dining room.
      entrance - students on his entrance.
      dining - students on his dining room.

    • onProfessorUpdate

      void onProfessorUpdate(ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> professors)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a student is moved on the dining room and there's a change in the professors.
      Parameters:
      professors - professors of all the players.

    • onMoneyUpdate

      void onMoneyUpdate(int playerID, int money, int generalMoneyReserve)
      Updates the ModelStorage when there's a change in the money of a player and the general money reserve. (by gaining one from the dining room or by losing them from playing a character card).
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that got his money changed.
      money - number of money of the player now.
      generalMoneyReserve - general money reserve updated number of money.

    • onDenyCard

      void onDenyCard(int grandmaIndex, int cardCost, int denyCardsOnCard, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCard, int isleID, int denyCard)
      Updates the ModelStorage when there's a change on an isle regarding deny cards.
      Parameters:
      grandmaIndex - the index of GRANDMA_HERBS character card.
      cardCost - the cost of GRANDMA_HERBS character card.
      denyCardsOnCard - number of deny cards on GRANDMA_HERBS character card.
      isleID - ID of the isle where the deny card has been removed.
      denyCard - number of deny cards on the isle.

    • onStudentMoving_toIsle

      void onStudentMoving_toIsle(int playerID, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> entrance, int isleID, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> isleStudents)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player moves a student on an isle.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that placed a student on an isle.
      entrance - students on the entrance of the player.
      isleID - ID of the isle where the player placed the student.
      isleStudents - students of the isle where the player placed the student.

    • onMNMovement

      void onMNMovement(int totalIsles, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> students, ArrayList<TowerColors> towerColors, int whereMNId, ArrayList<Boolean> denyCards, ArrayList<Integer> numberOfIsles, ArrayList<Integer> numberOfTowers)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player moves mother nature.
      Parameters:
      totalIsles - the actual number of isle.
      students - students on each isle.
      towerColors - tower colors on each isle.
      whereMNId - ID of the isle where now there's mother nature.
      denyCards - deny cards number on each isle.
      numberOfIsles - the number of isle tha compose an isle (isle with 2 or more isles are unified isles)
      numberOfTowers - the number of towers on each isle.

    • onCloudUpdate

      void onCloudUpdate(int playerID, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> entrance, int cloudId)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player picks students from a cloud.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that picked the students from a cloud.
      entrance - students that are now on the entrance of the player.
      cloudId - ID of the picked cloud.

    • onFillCloud

      void onFillCloud(ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> clouds)
      Updates the ModelStorage the clouds are refilled.
      Parameters:
      clouds - students on each cloud when are refilled.

    • onCharacterCard

      void onCharacterCard(int characterCardId, CharacterCardsName cardName, int cardCost, int idPlayer, int generalReserve, int playerMoney, int denyCards, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCharacter)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player plays a character card.
      Parameters:
      characterCardId - index of the character card played.
      cardName - name of the character card played.
      cardCost - cost of the character card played (after having been played).
      idPlayer - ID of the player that played the character card.
      generalReserve - the number of money in the general money reserve after having played the character card.
      playerMoney - the number of money of the player after having played the character card.
      denyCards - number of deny cards on the character card after having been played.
      studentsOnCharacter - students on the character card after having been played.

    • onEffectActivation

      void onEffectActivation(int characterCardIndex, int cardCost, int denyCardsOnCard, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCard, int id, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> students)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player activates the effect of a character card. It's used to activate the effect of the MONK / JESTER.
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - index of the character card played.
      cardCost - cost of the character card played.
      denyCardsOnCard - deny cards on the character card played.
      studentsOnCard - students on the character card played.
      id - color of the first student chosen.
      students - students on the chosen isle (MONK) / player entrance (JESTER).

    • onEffectActivation

      void onEffectActivation(ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> professors)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player activates the effect of a character card. It's used to activate the effect of the FARMER.
      Parameters:
      professors - on each player dining room.

    • onEffectActivation

      void onEffectActivation(int totalIsles, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> students, ArrayList<TowerColors> towerColors, int whereMNId, ArrayList<Boolean> denyCards, ArrayList<Integer> numberOfIsles, ArrayList<Integer> numberOfTowers)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player activates the effect of a character card. It's used to activate the effect of the HERALD.
      Parameters:
      totalIsles - the actual number of isles.
      students - students on each isle.
      towerColors - colors of the towers on each isle.
      whereMNId - isle where there's mother nature.
      denyCards - number of deny cards on each isle.
      numberOfIsles - indicates for each group of isles how many isles are in it (unified isles there are 2 or more isles).
      numberOfTowers - number of towers in the player tower storage.

    • onEffectActivation

      void onEffectActivation(int playerID, int turnOrder, int mnMovement)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player activates the effect of a character card. It's used to activate the effect of the MAGICAL_LETTER_CARRIER.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that played the character card.
      turnOrder - turn order of the assistant card in the discard pile.
      mnMovement - possible mother nature movement of the assistant card in the discard pile.

    • onEffectActivation

      void onEffectActivation(int characterCardIndex, int cardCost, int denyCardsOnCard, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCard, int isleID, int denyCard)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player activates the effect of a character card. It's used to activate the effect of the GRANDMA_HERBS.
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - the index of the character card played.
      cardCost - the cost of the character card played.
      denyCardsOnCard - number of deny cards on the character card played.
      isleID - ID of the isle chosen by the player in which it will be put a deny card.
      denyCard - number of deny cards on the isle chosen.

    • onEffectActivation

      void onEffectActivation()
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player activates the effect of a character card. It's used to activate the effect of the CENTAUR / KNIGHT / FUNGIST.

    • onEffectActivation

      void onEffectActivation(ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> studentsInEntrance, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> studentsInDining)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player activates the effect of a character card. It's used to activate the effect of the MINSTREL, THIEF.
      Parameters:
      studentsInEntrance - students on the entrance of each player.
      studentsInDining - students on the dining room of each player.

    • onEffectActivation

      void onEffectActivation(int characterCardIndex, int cardCost, int denyCardsOnCard, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCard, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> studentsInDining)
      Updates the ModelStorage when a player activates the effect of a character card. It's used to activate the effect of the SPOILED_PRINCESS.
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - index of the character card played.
      cardCost - the cost of the character card played.
      denyCardsOnCard - number of deny cards on the character card.
      studentsOnCard - students on the character card.
      studentsInDining - students on the dining room of each player.

    • onKO

      void onKO(int playerID, String errorMessage)
      Handle a KO message.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that receive the KO message.
      errorMessage - brief description of what the error is.
